long_description: The men's REI Rimrock Parka features an urban look along with warmth and weather protection for the outdoors. Upper body and collar are lined with plush fleece for added warmth and softness. Polyester shell has a durable water repellent (DWR) finish and is windproof up to 60 mph. Adjustable zip-off hood, snap cuff tabs and 2-way front zipper let you adapt to changing conditions. Parka-length cut extends weather protection. The men's REI Rimrock parka offers plenty of storage: zip hand pockets; snap-flap pockets on the chest and lower front; a zip pocket on the upper sleeve.
short_description: The men's REI Rimrock Parka features an urban look along with warmth and weather protection for the outdoors.
